dcterms:description: A dataset used for identifying fraudulent online bank account opening requests within a large consumer bank, containing applications submitted through an online platform with explicit consent to store and process data. The dataset includes eight months of data with fluctuating fraud prevalence and varying application distributions.
dcterms:title: Bank Account Fraud dataset

dcterms:creator: Sérgio Jesus
José Pombal
Duarte Alves
André Cruz
Pedro Saleiro
Rita Ribeiro
João Gama
Pedro Bizarro
dcterms:description: A suite of datasets designed for evaluating machine learning techniques in the context of bank account fraud detection, featuring six distinct synthetic tabular datasets that emulate real-world data with controlled bias and class imbalance.
dcterms:title: Bank Account Fraud Dataset Suite
